Goal Representation:
behavior sit_on_chair(chair:item):
    body:
        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        # Sit on the specified chair

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair)
        # Select a chair that is close to the character
        sit_on_chair(chair)
        # Execute the behavior to sit on the chair

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair)
        # Since the goal is to sit on the chair in front of the computer,
        # bind the chair which is close to the character (yourself)
        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        # Achieve sitting on the chair

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind chair: item where:
            is_chair(chair) and close_char(char, chair)
        # Select the chair close to the character

        achieve on_char(char, chair)
        # Sit on the selected chair in front of the computer

behavior __goal__():
